snippet: Mayor de Blasio made a cameo appearance on the CBS television show “The Good Wife.”
abstract: New York City Mayor de Blasio, in another sign of his rapidly growing national profile, makes cameo appearance on CBS television show The Good Wife, playing exaggerated version of himself.
lead_paragraph: Mayor de Blasio made a cameo appearance on the CBS television show “The Good Wife.”

headline.main: Main Ingredient in Mayor’s TV Cameo: Ham
headline.print_headline: Main Ingredient in Mayor’s TV Cameo: Ham
